start.annotation: A Sonnet is a moment's monument

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r06_line r07_phr

LMNL.text: A Sonnet is a moment's monument, —

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r08_phr r09_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r08_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r08_phr r10_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r10_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r10_line r11_s r12_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r11_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r11_s r13_line r14_phr

LMNL.text: Whether for lustral rite or dire portent,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r11_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r11_s r15_quatrain r16_line r17_phr

LMNL.text: Of its own arduous fulness reverent:

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r11_s r15_quatrain
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r11_s r15_quatrain r18_line r19_phr

LMNL.text: Carve it in ivory or in ebony,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r11_s r15_quatrain
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r11_s r15_quatrain r20_line r21_phr

LMNL.text: As Day or Night may rule;

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r11_s r15_quatrain r20_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r11_s r15_quatrain r20_line r22_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r11_s r15_quatrain r22_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r11_s r15_quatrain r22_phr r23_line

LMNL.text: Its flowering crest impearled and orient.

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r25_s r26_quatrain r27_line r28_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r25_s r26_quatrain r27_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r25_s r26_quatrain r27_line r29_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r25_s r26_quatrain r29_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r25_s r26_quatrain r29_phr r30_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r25_s r26_quatrain r30_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r25_s r26_quatrain r30_line r31_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r25_s r26_quatrain r30_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r25_s r26_quatrain r30_line r32_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r25_s r26_quatrain
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r25_s r26_quatrain r33_phr r34_line

LMNL.text: Whether for tribute to the august appeals

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r25_s r26_quatrain r33_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r25_s r26_quatrain r33_phr r35_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r25_s r26_quatrain r35_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r25_s r26_quatrain r35_line r36_phr

LMNL.text: or dower in Love's high retinue,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r25_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r25_s r37_couplet r38_line r39_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r25_s r37_couplet r38_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r25_s r37_couplet r38_line r40_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r25_s r37_couplet r38_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r25_s r37_couplet r38_line r41_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r25_s r37_couplet
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r24_sestet r25_s r37_couplet r42_line r43_phr

LMNL.text: In Charon's palm it pay the toll to Death.
